Package algorithms

Class Yannakakis

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.Yannakakis
  • public class Yannakakis
extends Object
    ArrayList-based implementation of the Yannakakis algorithm for acyclic queries. Produces all the query results in O(input + output) but does not sort them.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis

    • Method Detail

      • get_next

        public Tuple get_next()
        Computes the next Tuple that is a solution to the query in ranked order (ascending cost). Ties are broken arbitrarily.
        Returns:
        Tuple The next best Tuple solution or null if there are no other solutions.

      • compute_all_results

        private Relation compute_all_results()
        Computes all the query results with 2 sweeps: one bottom-up with semi-joins and one top-down that joins the relations.
        Returns:
        Relation A new object that contains the output tuples.

      • semi_join

        private Relation semi_join​(Relation ri,
                           Relation rj,
                           org.javatuples.Pair<int[],​int[]> join_condition)
        Computes the semi-join of two relations ri and rj. The result consists of all the tuples of R_i that have a joining pair in R_j.
        Parameters:
        ri -
        rj -
        join_condition -
        Returns:
        Relation A new object that contains all the tuples of ri that have a joining pair in rj.

      • join

        private Relation join​(Relation ri,
                      Relation rj,
                      org.javatuples.Pair<int[],​int[]> join_condition)
        Computes the join of two relations ri and rj.
        Parameters:
        ri -
        rj -
        join_condition -
        Returns:
        Relation A new object that contains all the matching pairs between ri and rj based on the join condition.

        public static void main​(String[] args)
